dua.english: Bismillahi, wa-s-salatu wa-s-salamu 'ala Rasulillah, Allahumma inni as'aluka min fadlika
dua.translation: In the name of Allah, and prayers and peace be upon the Messenger of Allah. O Allah, I ask You from Your favor.

steps.step: Sai

dua.name: Dua od Sai
dua.arabic: إِنَّ الصَّفَا وَالْمَرْوَةَ مِن شَعَائِرِ اللَّهِ
dua.english: Inna ṣ-ṣafā wa l-marwata min sha’ā’iri llāh(i)
dua.translation: Indeed, Safa and Marwa are from the Signs of Allah.

steps.step: Halq or taqsir
Prepare to enter Ihram, a spiritual state of purity and devotion. This includes washing your body and changing into Ihram clothing, preferably at a miqat station outside the holy city.

dua.name: Talbiyah
dua.arabic: لَبَّيْكَ اللَّهُمَّ حَجًّا
dua.english: Labbaik Allahumma hajjan
dua.translation: Here I am at your service O Allah, (in response to Your call), here I am. Here I am at Your service and You have no partners. Verily all praise, grace and sovereignty belong to You. You have no partners.

steps.step: Recite the Talbiyah in the miqat station to declare intention to make the pilgrimage
Proceed to Makkah and perform Tawaf al-Qudum (Tawaf of Arrival) around the Kaaba in Masjid al-Haram.
Perform the Welcome Tawaf, enter Al Haram (Holy Mosque) and circle the Holy Kaaba seven times in a counterclockwise direction.
